title: University E-Learning System Construction and Operational Project Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic experience with e-learning platforms and foundational concepts in mathematics education
context.additional_context: Blended learning environment where corporate-university collaboration practitioners conduct action research projects for e-learning system implementation and operation

learning_goals: Learners can establish a plan for introducing a university e-learning system by applying action research methodology.
Learners can explain the design and development process for e-learning content tailored to mathematics curriculum characteristics.
Learners can diagnose problems occurring during e-learning system operations and propose improvement strategies.
Learners can suggest continuous improvement plans based on e-learning project evaluation results.

resources: Access Permissions for LMS (Learning Management System) Platforms

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
